reviews.review: Best game ever. If you haven't played it yet, play it.
Game didn't allow me to boo/shame the oildriller at the festival, moral choices are thus worthless. 3/10
Je sais pas quoi dire, je recommande

Nat√ºrlich muss ich ein GO geben f√ºr dieses Spiel. Es ist in die Jahre gekommen, es hat nicht die beste Grafik, wie man sie sich heute vorstellt. Doch f√ºr ein Spiel aus dieser Zeit kann man es noch heute sehr gut spielen. Die Story ist tats√§chlich nicht veraltet. Es geht um Rassismus und Menschen, die sich f√ºr G√∂tter halten.

15 GB Festplattenspeicher erz√§hlen eine eigene Geschichte. Die Welt ist riesig, in die man √ºber den Wolken eintaucht. Es hat nichts mit dem BioShock zu tun, das im Meer spielt, tats√§chlich erinnert es einen nicht wirklich daran. Nur manche Ger√§usche und manche Spielmechaniken lassen einen wissen, dass es die gleichen Macher sind.

Doesn't have the same atmosphere as the earlier two games, but is still a great entry. The weapons are a step up from previous games, the vigors are interesting and the environment is new and refreshing. The ending is one of the most memorable in gaming as a whole.

"There's always a lighthouse, there's always a man, there's always a city."

Bioshock 1: good story, great worldbuilding, mediocre shooter

Bioshock Infinite: messy story, okeyish worldbuilding, bad shooter

Brilliant game, the usual shoot 'em up but this time with a good reason (other than just to hack/slash and stay alive)... has a great story line, beautiful artwork and a faithful companion to help you though. Found the final battle a bit tough, even on easy mode, so I'd take your time in the game to earn/buy all the resilience rewards you can before you get towards the end. Another bonus is that this is an earlier game so not too demanding on the graphics cards.  Price of GPUs has gone stupid recently, thankfully this gem of a game will work well on many older models which are still affordable.
I have no clue how this is a BioShock game yet, but it's a damn fine story-focused FPS. Polished up the you-know-what with some of the most gorgeous displays of art design in a video game.

Sobrevalorado, el primero fue el mejor, en este quitaron ese factor de exploraci√≥n que era tan bueno en el primer Bioshock, me gustaba que pod√≠as usar varias armas y hacer combos en el primero, en este hay plasmidos que hasta se sienten repetitivos y muy similares, siento que la  estructura de el ambiente puede ser tan mejorada, no lo recomiendo, ya que el primero es mejor

First off a visually appealing game, two absolutely love bioshock, and this holds a warm spot in my heart <3.

I'd pay to like replay this but not remembering it just so i can experience it again. i have yet to do hard and 1999 mode too. 

10/10 game <3

after playing the burial at sea episodes this game is a god damn materpiece.

The game has a serious difficulty issue, played the game on the hardest difficulty yet around 70% of gameplay is walk in the park and 15% is balanced decently with 10% being actually difficult and 5% being so hard its unfun.
One of the best stories in a game.

Uno de los pocos juegos que me ha dado una historia que me ha chocado, y que me ha dejado pensando por m√°s de 1 hora despu√©s de jugarlo, recomendarlo sobra, este es un juego que tiene que ser jugado

The hype of the game is not real. Even at a discount this is a big waste of money. Gameplay is 3rd tier. You are constantly running out of ammo so what is the point of upgrading your weapons of choice. Vigors are uninspiring compared to Plasmids in the original BioShock. Same with gears. Both are dumbed down and you won't think and plan about them as you did in BioShock.

I get that a lot of people like it because of the plot. Frankly it's sh*t. What it is is convoluted so it evokes a lot of reading into by a lot of people. And they mistake that as a great plot. It's not.

I am disappointed that I fell for the hype. What a waste of time and money. Stay away.

A masterpiece of a shooter game. Very action packed with a detailed and complex narrative, it's linear but you still have plenty of gameplay options to try. The vigors definitely make for much more variety in the gameplay compared to the typical shooter. 

The DLCs are also really good as well. Especially Burial at Sea Episode 2.

You just HAVE to play it.
This was the best game i have play in a very long time

W√§hrend wir uns hier unterhalten, habe ich schon mein geheimes Netzwerk aus Spionen kontaktiert und deine IP-Adresse wird grade r√ºckverfolgt, also mach dich besser auf den Sturm gefasst, du Made. Aber ich bin nicht nur im unbewaffneten Kampf ausgebildet, ich habe auch Zugriff auf das Waffenarsenal der Bundeswehr und ich werde es aufs Vollste aussch√∂pfen, um deinen elendigen Arsch von diesem Kontinent zu blasen, du kleiner Schei√ükerl. Aber nein, das hast du nicht hinbekommen, das wolltest du nicht, und jetzt wirst du daf√ºr bezahlen, du verdammter Idiot. Du wirst in meinem Hass ertrinken. Du bist tot, Junge.
